synergynet3.web.core

Class AppSystemDeviceControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • synergynet3.cluster.clustereddevice.ClusteredDevice
      • synergynet3.web.core.AppSystemDeviceControl

  • public class AppSystemDeviceControl
extends ClusteredDevice
    Manages the network cluster default entries for SynergyNetApp extending application.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AppSystemDeviceControl(java.lang.String deviceName)
      Creates the default shared properties of a network cluster for a device.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DistributedProperty<java.util.ArrayList<ContentTransferedMessage>> getContentTransferToTableControl()
      Get the value of the network cluster property representing messages relating content arriving on a table.

      Get the value of the network cluster property representing the value to be used when converting between pixels and metres.

      Get the value of the network cluster property representing messages announcing whether network flicks are enabled for this device.

      Get the value of the network cluster property representing messages instigating the recreation of items from a removable drive.

      Get the value of the network cluster property representing messages instigating the recreation of items from a device's directory in the networked shared cache.

      Get the value of the network cluster property representing messages instigating the removal of any items in an environment not directly created by the application.

      Get the value of the network cluster property representing messages initiating tables sending contents to projectors.

      Get the value of the network cluster property representing messages initiating tables sending screenshots to projectors.

      Get the value of the network cluster property representing messages instigating bringing student icons to the top of an environment.

      Get the value of the network cluster property representing messages announcing the location of another device's interface position.
